title: Cognitive Games for Physical Awareness: Home Training Program for the Elderly

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Smartphone Skills and General Physical Exercise Comprehension
context.additional_context: Short-term program designed for working professionals, considering time constraints and technological environments (no PC access, smartphone-centric)

learning_goals: Learners can participate 100% in a gamification-based exercise program for 60 minutes, three times weekly, over one week
Learners can improve balance sensation and reaction speed by 20% through integrated physical-cognitive exercises
Learners can record exercise performance results and generate weekly reports using a mobile app

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
